Subject: RE: US v Epstein 
Date: Fri, 26 Jul 2019 18:37:36 +0000 
Thanks 
Could I  burden you, your team to break out of the intended first discovery production and to email to Reid and 
myself as soon as you are able the search warrants and affidavits and if they are easily available the returns, 
thanks, Marty 
Martin G. Weinberg, Esq. 
 This Electronic Message contains information from the Law

From:

 Ori inal Messa e 
Sent: Friday, July 26 2019 1:48 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: US v Epstein 
Marty, 
Thank you. Regarding discovery, we expect to make an initial production no later than Tuesday, and we expect it 
will be electronic discovery in native format -- that is, PDFs, JPEGs, etc. (in other words, not .tiff and load files 
as is sometimes the 
case). 
thanks, 
 Original Message 
From: Martin Weinberg -MINIM> 
Sent: 
Friday. July 
26 2019 
13:43 
To: 
Cc: Martin Weinberg 
Subject: 
US v Epstein 
EFTA00021662

I am in receipt of your earlier email about preservation/production and will have a responsive letter to you no 
later than Monday morning (hopefully today or over weekend). 
- can you advise us as to when we will receive the initial discovery subject to the now issued 
Protective Order and to the extent it is an electronic production, its format so that we can have Steptoe IT prepare 
for its receipt. 
Thanks 
Marty 
Martin G. 
Weinberg, Esq. 
Mir
